document_data.name: ''Ring of Reversal''
document_data.mainbody:
the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], the powerful ring was created by [[Amelior Amanitas]]. The [[wizard]]'s aim was to stop a [[Zhentarim]] plan to send out a horde of creatures in all directions to dominate the [[Sword Coast]] to the [[Moonsea]]. The [[Zhent]]s aimed to do this by combining four statuettes that had the power to magically repel the monsters. Only a magical item, the ''ring of reversal'', could reverse the function of the combined power of the statuettes, causing the monsters to be sent back (attracted) to the statuettes. The future [[Heroes of Ascore]] placed the ring at the apex of the statuettes, stopping the onslaught of monsters, and were bestowed the aforementioned title.
[[File:RescueOfAmanitas.png|thumb|right|270px|''Amelior Amanitas bestows the powerful [[ring]] upon the [[Heroes of Ascore]]-to-be.'']]
